transcript: if you see strong men there's so much cardio and just literally like holding 1,000 lbs and walking like if you think about physics like how much energy does it take to move you know half a ton 100 yards takes this much energy how much energy it take to run a mile and then you start looking at you're like oh I just ran a mile in 40 seconds if you do a weight exercise you can do like a medium weight for a lot of reps and that's when you like learn the meaning of cardio
